title: Web Designer/Creator for Crypto Website
job_overview:
We're looking for a talented and reliable freelance web designer to collaborate on a project-based crypto website. You should have a strong portfolio showcasing modern, responsive, and user-friendly websites. Experience in crypto, Web3, or fintech design is a big plus but not required.

This is a freelance opportunity with the potential for more work in the future.

What We’re Looking For:
-Strong skills in modern website design (UI/UX)
-Experience with Web3/Crypto branding and design trends is preferred
-Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
-Familiarity with tools like Figma, Adobe XD, Webflow, or similar

Basic understanding of web development is a plus, but not required

To Apply, Please Send Us:
-Your portfolio and/or sample work (crypto-related work highly preferred)
-Your proposal rate for this project (flat rate or hourly with estimated hours)
-A short note about your availability and typical turnaround time

We’re excited to build something great—if you’re passionate about clean design and the future of crypto, we’d love to hear from you!
